namespace.description: Classical texts hosted by the Perseus Project at Tufts University
Texts from the CAMENA (Corpus Automatum Multiplex Electorum Neolatinitatis Auctorum) project at the University of Mannheim.
Papyri from the Duke Databank of Documentary Papyri.
Texts from the Max Planck Institute.

collection.title: Greek and Roman Materials
collection.scope: Primary and secondary sources for the study of ancient Greece and Rome
